title: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
description: When attempting to set the output location and classpath for a project, an error message appears stating 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. This occurs because setting the output location and classpath are two separate operations, and setting the output location first creates an illegal state.
OB: When pressing 'Ok' after changing the project properties to use the project as the source folder and output location, an error message appears stating 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Create a project with 'src' as the source folder and 'bin' as the output location.
2. In the project properties, change the settings to use the project as the source folder and the project as the output location.
